EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - Consultant Services Email - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Mary, Congrats on getting that to-do list in check (can you give me some advice on that  ha!). You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. I look forward to speaking with you, Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Weve got some serious perks youre eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Mary Ann Markowicz [mailto:maryannmarkowicz@hotmail.com] Sent: Tuesday, April 30, 2013 4:03 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Checking In - MBO Partners / Mary Ann Markowicz Hi Sara, I finally got all of my pressing to-do items completed and would like to speak with you about joining MBOs network/services. Do you have some time this week to have a phone conversation? Thanks so much! _____________________________ Mary Ann Markowicz Managing Director, The Service LeaderUS Mobile 928-274-1307 Web/blog -- The Service Leader <http://theserviceleader.wordpress.com/> Facebook -- The Service Leader <http://on.fb.me/ppyHT6%20> Twitter -- @MaryMarkowicz <http://twitter.com/#%21/MaryMarkowicz> Pinterest - The Service Leader <http://pinterest.com/theserviceleade/>
This transmission may contain information that is proprietary, confidential and/or exempt from disclosure under applicable law. It is intended only for the use of the person(s) named above. If you are not an intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any review, dissemination, distribution or duplication of this communication is strictly prohibited. If you are not an intended recipient, please contact the sender by use of the same medium by which you received this transmission and destroy all copies of the original message. From: Mary Ann Markowicz [mailto:maryannmarkowicz@hotmail.com <mailto:maryannmarkowicz@hotmail.com>] Sent: Tuesday, April 02, 2013 3:03 PM To: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Subject: RE: MBO Partners / Mary Ann Markowicz Hi Sara, Thanks for the reach out. I just rolled off of an engagement in Manila and am in search for new work. So, if you have any leads, Id be open to hearing about them. Hope you are doing well From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>] Sent: Tuesday, April 02, 2013 12:37 PM To: maryannmarkowicz@hotmail.com <mailto:maryannmarkowicz@hotmail.com> Subject: MBO Partners / Mary Ann Markowicz Hello Mary Ann, As a courtesy I wanted to follow up with you to see how the contract search was going. Any update would be great,Sara___________________________________Sara Conde Consultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: (703) 793-6028f: 703-793-6070e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC02MzUmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTYzNSZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTYxNjEzNjQmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUyMzk4MjUmZW1haWxpZD1tYXJ5YW5ubWFya293aWN6QGhvdG1haWwuY29tJnVzZXJpZD1sLTEyOC0yNjI2MS05OTAyNS0xJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsXx4uwvXLHr08Yy0EZ5VunJEUWy2YECTtQhcOuuEwcWGog8zQ5X><
